description: Defines API endpoints related to liking content, specifically methods to check if content is liked and to set like status, using Retrofit interface.

classes.name: LikesApi
classes.description: A Retrofit interface defining endpoints for retrieving and setting like status for content items.

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Performs a GET request to retrieve the like state for a specific content ID.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Performs a POST request to update the like state for a specific content ID.
